entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, feeling ashamed and outbursting after smashing a bowl.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who tries to calm him down and suggests thinking about his actions.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another friend of Harry's who gets up from the table and leaves after Hermione does.

entities.name: murtlap essence
entities.description: A bowl of potion that Harry smashed with his wand.

relationships.description: Hermione tries to calm down Harry after he outbursts.
Ron leaves the room with Hermione, while Harry stays behind to clean up the mess.
Harry accidentally smashes the bowl of murtlap essence with his wand.
